meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>fire</kanji> <kanji>wound</kanji> is a <vocabulary>burn</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>scald</vocabulary> you got from fire (or other hot things). Ouch!
readingMnemonic: The reading for this is unlike anything you've seen with these kanji. Try to think about a <vocabulary>burn</vocabulary> (on your arm) being caused by a <reading>yakky do</reading>do (やけど) bird (which is a dodo bird that has yak-like features). Take a look at how weird it is, and wonder why it is burning you. Feel the pain.
